Hasu Patel, composer, performer and educator is one of the few world-class female artists performing today the Classical Music of India on Sitar, the most popular string instrument of India. Her style of playing is known as Gayaki Ang (vocal style), where the Sitar replicates the fluidity and subtle nuances of the human voice. This innovative technique is credited to her Guru, Ustad Vilayat Khan Sahib.
